definition: to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

sentences.english: Running shoe built for the neutral to under-pronator who requires an enhanced cushioning.
sentences.chinese: 跑鞋建中立副旋者需要增加缓冲。

sentences.english: Players may wear a pair of thick socks and lights, soft-soled running shoes.
sentences.chinese: 参加者可穿一对厚袜子及轻而鞋底较软的跑鞋。

sentences.english: And this way's more like the shopping area, popular for shoes and trainers.
sentences.chinese: 那条路更像购物区，因运动鞋和跑鞋而出名。

sentences.english: When you're shopping for running shoes, make sure the salesperson measures your feet.
sentences.chinese: 当你在选购跑鞋时一定要让售货员测量自己的脚码。

sentences.english: Are you more or less satisfied with expensive running shoes?
sentences.chinese: 你会不会对价格昂贵的跑鞋更偏爱一点？

sentences.english: Earlier studies found that running shoes could increase the risk for plantar fasciitis and ankle sprains.
sentences.chinese: 早期调查发现跑鞋会增加患上脚疣和脚踝扭伤的风险。

sentences.english: Money often buys higher-quality goods, but not when it comes to running shoes.
sentences.chinese: 高价往往能买到高质量的产品，但对跑鞋却未必如此。

sentences.english: What factors do you consider when shopping for running shoes?
sentences.chinese: 你在购买跑鞋使会考虑哪些因素呢？

sentences.english: Some people require the mechanical support that a running shoe offers.
sentences.chinese: 一些人需要跑鞋提供的那种机械支撑。

sentences.english: How do I know when to replace my running shoes?
sentences.chinese: 我怎样才能知道更换跑鞋的时间？

sentences.english: How about some very cool sneakers for your children?
sentences.chinese: 给你的孩子们买双不错的跑鞋怎么样？

sentences.english: My heel slips out of my running shoe with every pair I buy.
sentences.chinese: 我的脚后跟总是从我买的每一双跑鞋里滑出来。

sentences.english: Your feet may love running shoes. But what about the rest of yourbody?
sentences.chinese: 双足也许爱上了跑鞋，但是你身体的其他部分呢？

sentences.english: Most shoelaces on running shoes are extra long, so be safe and double-knot them.
sentences.chinese: 多数跑鞋的鞋带很长，所以要系好，要系双扣。

sentences.english: So why would someone choose to give up their comfortable, cushioned running shoes?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有人会放弃那些舒服而且有缓冲的跑鞋？

sentences.english: If you want to get in shape, don’t buy running shoes.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想拥有好的体型，就先别去买跑鞋。

definition: fitting one's feet (of shoes or socks)
